text: (satanata sahabhagi novima) andhaya mata varadak nove. tavada abadhitaya mata da varadak nove. rogiya mata da varadak nove. tavada kavareku allah ha ohuge dutayananta avanata vanne da evata pahalin gamgavo gala basna (svarga) uyan valata ohu ohu va Ã¦tulat karayi. namut kavareku pitupanne da ohu vedaniya danduvamakin ohuta danduvam karayi
